description: The image depicts an unusual outdoor art installation in an urban setting, featuring two large, transparent inflatable bubbles. One bubble contains a cozy, makeshift bedroom with a purple bed, pillows, and small decorative items, suggesting an intimate, private space amidst the public area. The other bubble appears to be a bathroom setup with a white bathtub and towels, creating a stark contrast to the bustling city environment visible in the background. This installation draws the attention of passersby, blending elements of private living spaces with the public sphere.
poem:
In the heart of the city's roar,
A bubble bedroom, bath and more,
Transparent walls invite stares,
In public space, private affairs,
A curious blend of indoor and outdoor.
